title: Frome Valley Trail Walking Route

images.title: Maurice D Budden / River Frome near Maiden Newton
images.caption: River Frome near Maiden Newton

images.title: Andrew Smith / The Frome valley, Maiden Newton
images.caption: The Frome valley, Maiden Newton. A view towards the hamlet of Cruxton on the far side of the valley. In the foreground is Langcombe Bottom.

images.title: Jonathan Billinger / River Frome, Dorchester
images.caption: River Frome, Dorchester. Looking north from the main road where the High East Street and London Road meet.

description: This is a riverside walk along the River Frome from its source at Evershot to Dorchester. Once complete the walk will extend to the mouth of the Frome at Poole Harbour. The trail passes through Maiden Newton, Bradford Peveril and Charminster following existing rights of way as close as possible to the Frome. There is plenty to enjoy for wildlife lovers with Kingfisher, Sandmartin, Otter, Water Vole and damselfly often sighted by the Frome.
